scripts.build-extensions: cd mediabox/extension && npm run build && cd ../../obs/extension && npm run build && cd ../../rabbitmq/extension && npm run build && cd ../../restream/extension && npm run build && cd ../../x32/extension && npm run build && cd ../../xkeys/extension && npm run build
